changeSet.author: pjoshi
changeSet.id: Scheduled job for exporting modified specimen and participant detail
changeSet.sql:
select identifier into @userId from catissue_user where login_name = '$system';
insert into os_scheduled_jobs (identifier, name, created_by, start_date, end_date, scheduled_minute, scheduled_hour, scheduled_day_of_week, scheduled_day_of_month, activity_status, repeat_schedule, type, command, task_impl_fqn, rt_args_provided, rt_args_help_text) values (default, 'Export modified spec participant details job', @userId, now(), null, 30, 00, 'MONDAY', null, 'Active', 'WEEKLY', 'INTERNAL', null, 'com.krishagni.openspecimen.cchs.service.impl.ExportModSpecParticipantDetailsJob', 0, null);
